articles.author: Technology Networks
articles.title: UTI Oral Vaccine Offers Promising Alternative to Antibiotics - Technology Networks
articles.description: An oral vaccine against recurrent UTIs could reduce the need for antibiotic treatment.
articles.content: Initial results from the first long-term follow-up study of the safety and effectiveness of the MV140 vaccine for recurrent UTIs are presented this weekend at the European Association of Urology (EAU… [+4646 chars]
